Articles.Content:
At the moment, under key bindings for on foot, the only analog options are for translating with RCS. I've bound these to my x-box 360 controller, and it works great when I turn on RCS, but I really want to be able to walk around with the same controls, as I would in a game for the consoles. As it is, I have to set down my controller and use the keyboard whenever I want to walk around. Ideally I should be able to bind the WSAD keys to something other than movement controls, and I did so for all vehicles, but I'm still stuck with WSAD on foot.

Thank you for reading.
This would be correct bindings for walking. Think of a Kerbal as a "craft" when on EVA. The bindings are appropriate.
If the Kerbal were a "craft" when on EVA on a planet, I should be able to use analog controls to walk around, similar to how a rover can be driven around on planet using analog controls.

Yes you should, and it does. At least on my vanilla install.
